message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects its worth.
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer! I appreciate you considering my interest. While I value the product, $14,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price for this product and its true value. To make this work, I could come down to $13,000. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500. If we can find common ground there, I'm ready to close the deal. Otherwise, I'll need to explore other options.
